whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.description1: T-Construction CJSC was founded in April 2016.
whyChooseUs.description2: Throughout the history of its activities, the company has proven to be a reliable partner. Working with us is always convenient and mutually beneficial, which is the basis for long-term and continuous cooperation, as evidenced by our continuously growing list of clients. We stand out in the industry by offering an optimal combination of price and quality. The company has all the necessary resources to bring any project to life from the initial steps to commissioning.

meta.title: {title} - Service Page
meta.description: Learn more about {title} service and how we ensure quality, reliability, and safety.

description.content: Since 2020, the company has been carrying out various construction works under state procurement. During these years, we have implemented the construction and renovation of dozens of schools, kindergartens, sports halls, parks, and yards, playgrounds, as well as water supply and drainage systems.

As part of the UN Development Program in Armenia, we implemented a state subsidy program aimed at increasing the energy efficiency and thermal efficiency of multi-apartment buildings in Syunik and Lori regions.

items.content: Our team has the experience and technical skills for the construction and installation of power supply cables of any complexity. We use high-quality materials and modern technologies.
Our engineers develop unique and efficient designs, ensuring high-level safety and reducing energy losses.

We provide professional consulting services for optimizing and modernizing power supply systems. Choose us for your energy needs. Our team is ready to implement the most complex projects, meeting your most ambitious demands.

description.content: Key characteristics of the power supply system include durability, reliability, and safety. All electrical installation works are carried out in accordance with high-quality standards, using cables and equipment from trusted and well-known manufacturers. Work is carried out on substations and cable lines of 0.22 kV, 0.4 kV, 6 kV, 10 kV, 35 kV, and 110 kV.
In the development of Armenia's power system, the construction of a 110 kV cable transmission line became an important milestone, ensuring a new level of energy transmission and stability.

Over the years, T-Construction CJSC has gained extensive experience in performing overhead and underground cable works. The company's main advantage lies in its highly qualified, certified, and experienced engineers and specialists.

The company offers a full range of services, including the design of general networks, design of power transmission and distribution lines, obtaining all necessary permits and licenses, supply and installation of cables and materials.
Electric networks and power supply form the basis of the industrial sector for telecommunications operators and service companies.

T-Construction CJSC has earned a reputation as a reliable partner and supplier of cutting-edge technologies in the power industry, thanks to its systematic approach to the construction of high and low-voltage electrical networks, optical grounding wires, and transmission lines, as well as the supply and installation of transformer substations and alternative energy systems.
Leading specialists in the field are ready to carry out any complex work of restoration, renovation, and asphalting for rural roads and national highways.
Since 2016, we have been implementing various road construction works.
